name: Box Paradox
description:
Made For The Blackthornprod Game Jam #3! My first game jam (and finished project really). Flick the boxes with your mouse to move them into the portal above, but for every box you put in, 2 more will come out in a few seconds. Try to get the most boxes in the portal in before the broken portal can be fixed!

Thanks to everyone in the Blackthornprod disocrd server for being so supportive, inpiring, and helpful. It's crazy how much you can learn in a week!

Put your high scores in the comments along with any criticism, questions, and feedback
